title: Mixed feelings
review: It was a weird mixture of severe misogyny, with women working together to kick ass in a fantastical made up world. Ultimately, the women could only have freedom in death or fantasy.

title: Great semi-horror flick
review: I enjoyed this. It harkened back in some ways to the classics such as with some of the music at the beginning. Newer technologies were used by the ghost hunters. I didn't find it super scary but the concept was believable and interesting. And a couple nice twists.
